TopicTitle: Solar Panels "Blocked by (Celestial Body)" Even When Exposed to Sunlight

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 Home 64-bit (10.0, Build 22621) | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 3750H with Radeon Vega Mobile Gfx | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTF 1650 GDDR5 @ 4BG (128 bits) | RAM: 15.8 GB

 

Someone has already mentioned this in the tech support post as shown below, but the bug is still not fixed. What led to the bug is somewhat unclear, as it randomly happened to me. Beforehand I never had any problems with solar panels. However, my specific craft that is landed at Ike is encountering this problem, and unlike the tech support post, it is persistent after both reloading and restarting the game. Something I find notable is that my solar panels start working again as the sun is almost below the horizon, and most of the night they are working, then by dawn they are "Blocked by Ike" again. I think this is straightforward enough that I don't need to show a screenshot, but please let me know if I should attach anything to help track down this bug.

 

Edited August 3, 2023 by Anth12
